description: Every great ride starts with the right footwear. Made with responsibly sourced Merino wool for natural odor resistance and temperature regulation, our Bike Zero Cushion Ankle socks are designed with comfort in mind. With a 4 Degree elite fit system for a spot-on fit, a Virtually Seamless toe, and on-point mesh zones for added breathability, this sock is a foot’s best friend. The next time you’re ready to pedal out some miles, make these socks an indispensable part of your kit.
name: Smartwool Bike Zero Cushion Ankle Socks - Mens

specs.value: 46% Merino Wool, 26% Nylon, 25% Recycled Nylon, 3% Elastane
